attributes.action: Once the Conservatives elect a new leader we should have a general election.
attributes.additional_details: The Election should be called as soon as there is a new Conservative party leader and before Brexit negotiations begin.
attributes.background: Due to the referendum and the subsequent resignation of David Cameron we want a General Election to be called once the Conservative party has elected a new leader. It is unacceptable that a new PM will lead Brexit negotiations having only been elected by party members and not the full electorate...
